name: VCIO Budget vs Actual
query:
SELECT
  bl.category AS category,
  SUM(bl.amount) AS budget_amount,
  IFNULL(a.actual_amount, 0) AS actual_amount,
  (SUM(bl.amount) - IFNULL(a.actual_amount, 0)) AS variance
FROM `tabVCIO Budget Line` bl
JOIN `tabVCIO Budget` b ON b.name = bl.parent
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS actual_amount
  FROM `tabVCIO Actual Entry`
  WHERE period = %(period)s
  GROUP BY category
) a ON a.category = bl.category
WHERE b.period = %(period)s
  AND b.status IN ("Draft", "Active")
GROUP BY bl.category
ORDER BY bl.category
